Игра хороша, но читером много. Если вдруг решите поиграть и вас затянет, покупайте Прайм статус или попробуйте докопаться до него.
spelat är najz o spela med sina vänner

1) Cheater detection is literal trash : I've played with people using cheats for a long time without getting banned, that keep on cheating so ... nice one valve.
2) Unable to reconnect to the game : I just got an abandon since I had a power outage, I try to reconnect to the game and guess what ? "Failed attempt to reconnect to game". Fix you servers maybe Valve?
3) Community = HORSE FUCKING S H I T : enjoy trying to climb the rank without friends that you can communicate with.
4) The game's free to play yet you need to buy the prime status otherwise you get hackers, people with mental disability, individuals that cannot move their mouse from point A to point B.

Overall the game's fucking trash. But feel free to waste your time getting frustrated and waste your money on bullshit pointless skins and battle-pass prizes if you will.
